perturbation.original_text: For the 1998 racing season, Logan's shall be the primary sponsor of the Team, which fields a LMSC racing vehicle (the "Race Car") driven by Brad Baker. During the term of this Agreement, SRP will not represent any other product or company or accept as a primary, secondary, associate or contingent decal sponsor any other product reasonably deemed by Logan's to be competitive with Logan's.
perturbation.changed_text: For the 1998 racing season, Logan's shall be the primary sponsor of the Team, which fields a LMSC racing vehicle (the "Race Car"). During the term of this Agreement, SRP will not represent any other product or company or accept as a primary sponsor any other product reasonably deemed by Logan's to be competitive with Logan's.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'secondary, associate or contingent decal sponsor', Section 4, which grants SRP the right to obtain these sponsorships, now contradicts Section 1. This creates uncertainty about the extent of Logan's exclusivity and SRP's rights, as the definition of sponsorship levels is now inconsistent.

perturbation.original_text: SRP may not obtain any associate or secondary sponsors whose products or concepts compete with Logan's. Any associate and/or secondary sponsor may promote its role as a sponsor by signage, logos or trademarks on the Race Car, provided that such associate and/or secondary sponsors signage, logos or trademarks used on the Race Car, when viewed collectively, shall not cover any area greater than 25% of that of Logan's signage, logos or trademarks, nor conflict with the graphic design, or in other locations or on clothing as may be permitted by the terms of the Agreement. Logan's shall have the exclusive use of the hood, the rear quarter panel area above the tire and the bottom of the deck lid (rear facing panel, TV panel) of the Race Car, as shown on Exhibit C to this Agreement. All other areas permitted by NASCAR for sponsor signage, logos or trademarks and the "spoiler space" are reserved for NASCAR, SRP and the associate and secondary sponsors.
perturbation.changed_text: SRP may not obtain any sponsors whose products or concepts compete with Logan's.  Logan's shall have the exclusive use of the hood, the rear quarter panel area above the tire and the bottom of the deck lid (rear facing panel, TV panel) of the Race Car, as shown on Exhibit C to this Agreement. All other areas permitted by NASCAR for sponsor signage, logos or trademarks and the "spoiler space" are reserved for NASCAR and SRP.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clauses relating to associate and secondary sponsors, the contract now contradicts its earlier statements in Section 1 and subsequent references to such sponsorships. The permitted use of signage and sponsor promotion is now ambiguous, and the definition of allowable sponsorship is uncertain.

perturbation.original_text: In the event Logan's terminates this Agreement pursuant to this Article 10, Logan's shall be entitled to a pro rata refund of amounts prepaid for the current calendar year, with no further obligations under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: In the event Logan's terminates this Agreement pursuant to this Article 10, Logan's shall be entitled to a refund of amounts prepaid for the current calendar year, with no further obligations under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'pro rata', the calculation method for the refund is no longer defined. This contradicts the intent of providing a clear financial remedy upon termination, potentially leading to disputes over the refund amount.
